name: Lucky Block Impossible Ball Dash
description:
Lucky Block Impossible Ball Dash is a rage platformer game where you try to pick up as many lucky blocks as you can while avoiding spikes, red balls and red cubes.

Tap left to move the bouncing ball left and tap right to move the bouncing ball right. It sounds simple but is a challenge!

- More than 50 challenging levels
- Collect lucky blocks along the way to score points
- Addictive game play
- Beat your friends!

Note: Lucky Block Impossible Ball Dash is not an official application of Mojang. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB, and this product isn’t endorsed by or associated with Mojang AB.
